# Family Command Center - Angular Project Instructions

## Project Overview
This is a family command center web application built with Angular and Material Design, featuring a mobile-first approach for optimal experiences on both desktop and mobile devices.

## Technology Stack
- Angular (latest version)
- Angular Material (Google Material Design)
- Sass for styling
- TypeScript
- Responsive/Mobile-first design

## Features
- Dashboard with family activity overview
- Grocery list management
- Google Calendar integration
- Quick links to school sites and functions
- Family activity tracking

## Development Progress
- [x] Create project instruction file
- [x] Scaffold Angular project with Material
- [x] Configure Sass and mobile-first styling
- [x] Create feature modules and components
- [x] Implement responsive layouts
- [x] Project structure complete (dependencies need installation with Node.js v20.19+)
- [ ] Install dependencies (requires Node.js v20.19+ or v22.12+)
- [ ] Run development server

## Current Status

The project structure is complete with all necessary files created. However, to run the application:

1. **Node.js Update Required**: Your system currently has Node.js v20.12.2, but Angular 17+ requires v20.19 or higher.
2. **Next Steps**: 
   - Update Node.js to v20.19+ or v22.12+
   - Run `npm install` to install dependencies
   - Run `npm start` to launch the development server
   - Visit `http://localhost:4200` in your browser

See [README.md](../README.md) for detailed installation instructions.
